00044 void FusionCHPTilingDataTest::TestFileId()
00045 {
00046         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read("../../parsers/data/CHP_tiling_file");
00047         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chp != NULL);
00048         FusionCHPTilingData *tileChp = FusionCHPTilingData::FromBase(chp); 
00049         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp != NULL);
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->FileId() == "0000039321-1131034775-0000032391-0000005436-0000004827");
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetGenericData()->FileIdentifier() == "0000039321-1131034775-0000032391-0000005436-0000004827");
00052 }
00053 
00054 void FusionCHPTilingDataTest::testReadNonTiling()
00055 {
00056         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read("../../parsers/data/CHP_expression_file");
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chp != NULL);
00058         FusionCHPTilingData *tileChp = FusionCHPTilingData::FromBase(chp); 
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp == NULL);
00060         delete chp;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void FusionCHPTilingDataTest::testRead()
00064 {
00065         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read("../../parsers/data/CHP_tiling_file");
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chp != NULL);
00067         FusionCHPTilingData *tileChp = FusionCHPTilingData::FromBase(chp); 
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp != NULL);
00069 
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetNumberSequences() == 2);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetAlgName() == L"tile");
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00073 
00074         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = tileChp->GetAlgParams();
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00076         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00077         ParameterNameValueType &param = *it;
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"p1");
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"v1");
00080 
00081         const double eps=0.00001;
00082         CHPTilingEntry e;
00083         TilingSequenceData seq;
00084 
00085         tileChp->OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(0);
00086         seq = tileChp->GetTilingSequenceData();
00087         
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.name == L"n1");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.groupName == L"g1");
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.version == L"v1");
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.parameters.size() == 1);
00092         it = seq.parameters.begin();
00093         param = *it;
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"seq1_p1");
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"seq1_v1");
00096 
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(0) == 2);
00098         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(0, e);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 10);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 10.0f, eps);
00101 
00102         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(1, e);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 20);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 20.0f, eps);
00105 
00106 
00107         tileChp->OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(1);
00108         seq = tileChp->GetTilingSequenceData();
00109         
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.name == L"n2");
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.groupName == L"g2");
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.version == L"v2");
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.parameters.size() == 1);
00114         it = seq.parameters.begin();
00115         param = *it;
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"seq2_p1");
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"seq2_v1");
00118 
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(1) == 3);
00120         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(0, e);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 11);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 11.0f, eps);
00123 
00124         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(1, e);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 21);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 21.0f, eps);
00127 
00128         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(2, e);
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 31);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 31.0f, eps);
00131         
00132         delete tileChp;
00133 }
